  • Method Details

    • referencedPartitions

      public static <Partition> scala.collection.immutable.Map<PartitionId,Partition> referencedPartitions(PartitionId mainPartitionId, scala.Function1<PartitionId,scala.Option<Partition>> partitionById, TopologyPartitionOperations<Partition> tpOps)

    • apply

      public static <Partition, Node, Segment> AdjacencyList apply(PartitionId mainPartitionId, PartitionId outputPartitionId, scala.collection.immutable.Map<PartitionId,Partition> topologyPartitions, AdjacencyList.SegmentIdMapping segmentIdMapping, TopologyPartitionOperations<Partition> tpOps)
      Creates an AdjacencyList representing all possible transitions through nodes, starting at a vertex in the main partition. The list does not contain U-turns.

      Parameters:
      mainPartitionId - ID of partition local nodes of which are traversed
      outputPartitionId - ID of the output partition for which we want to collect adjacencies
      topologyPartitions - a collection of all partitions that contain segments connected to traversed nodes
      segmentIdMapping - Mapping from a partition id and segment id to an output partition and segment index. Note that we require all segments in mainPartitionId to be mapped to indices in outputPartitionId
      tpOps - topology partition operations
      Type Parameters:
      Partition topology partition, Node topology node, Segment topology segment

    • toCompressedSparseRow

      public static AdjacencyList.CSRGData toCompressedSparseRow(AdjacencyList graph, int vertexCount)
